div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1630 Palestine, 1930 (788) Burial: 2nd-1st cent. B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 86+ AR Antiochus VII: tetradr. (Tyre) Demetrius II: tetradr. (Tyre) Tyre: tetradr. Disposition: dispersed. Poor photos on file in ANS Kadman, INCJ, hoard 13 Probably the same hd. as no. 1629 above
